subject: Attention:Beneficiary,
body:
Attention:Beneficiary,
I have registered your ATM CARD of US$10.7 Million dollars with Courier Company with registration code of(Shipment Code awb 33xzs)please Contact with delivery information such as,Your Name, Your Address and Your Telephone Number:
You have to pay for the Insurance & Delivery and Security fee, please indicate the registration Number and ask how to pay the fee so that you can pay it immediately. Amount to pay $185.00 dollars only.
Your account has been set for AutoKDebit from your saved billing on the account in the next 24 hours.The items will be shipped in 36 hours and you will receive a confirmation email once they are shipped. You will receive another email with the TrackingLNumber.
If you want to cancel/modify your order, get in touch with us before it gets delivered to you please.
Please find your order information below:
amount to receive US$10.7Million
Order Number: AA-FDVHJ45
Order Date: 16-Decemberr-2023
Order Name: ATM CARD
Delivery Mode: delivery
Amount: to pay USD$185.00
So you are required to send the mentioned amount asap through the transfer services of World Remit or Ria with the Immigration in-charge office details provide below and transfer scan me the payment slip together with the name of your nearest Airport in your country/residential address/valid photo i.d card and reachable telephone number to call you upon his arrival.
INFORMATION TO RECEVIVE THE FEE:
RECEIVER NAME:EMMANUEL OKECHUKWU ANAGO
AMOUNT: $185.00 USD
ADDRESS: TERMINAL 2, MURITALA INTERNATIONAL AIRPORT
CITY: IKEJA, LAGOS
COUNTRY: NIGERIA
Finally notice to you today is last reminder to you,use world remit to send the money or buy Itune Gift card $185.00 or Steam Wallet scan it and send it to me now.
Yours faithfully,
Mr Oliver Alawuba
Managing Director/Chief Executive
Officer of United Bank For Africa
Give me a call on +234-8120-8040-91
or whatsapp me with this number.

subject: Re:    Attention:Beneficiary,
body:
Hello Mr. Oliver Alawuba,

Thank you for reaching out to me regarding the registration of my ATM card and the shipment details. I appreciate your efforts in keeping me informed about this process.

I have a few questions before proceeding with the payment for the insurance delivery and security fee. Could you please provide me with more information about the courier company that my ATM card is registered with? I would like to know their name and contact details so that I can verify their authenticity.

Additionally, could you clarify what you mean by "the next items will be shipped in hours"? Are there any other items being shipped along with my ATM card?

Regarding the payment, I would like to know more about the transfer services of World Remit or Ria. How secure are these services, and what are the steps involved in making the payment through them? Also, why do I need to provide my nearest airport address and a valid photo ID?

Lastly, could you explain why it is necessary to send an iTunes Gift Card or Steam Wallet scan? How does this relate to the payment for the insurance delivery and security fee?

I look forward to your response.

Best wishes,
Travis
